trans-unit.target: TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_TALK_ACTOR_02<tab>You wish to teach <var 29 EA02 /var> an ability, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? Then, if you would be so kind as to provide the requisite manual.

TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_001_DONE<tab>I can say with confidence that your race chocobo responded well to the <var 28 ((ChocoboRaceAbility)) E80201 /var> training. Pray judge for yourself, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>.

TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_TALK_ACTOR<tab>You wish to teach your race chocobo an ability, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>? Then, if you would be so kind as to provide the requisite manual.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_ERROR_001_01<tab>...But, more importantly, should you not first register your race chocobo?
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_ERROR_001_02<tab>Race chocobos cannot be taught abilities until they have been officially registered.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_ERROR_002_01<tab>...I gather from your expression that you do not have a training manual?
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_ERROR_002_02<tab>Race abilities cannot be taught without the requisite manuals, which can be purchased from the tack & feed trader at the race counter.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_ERROR_003_01<tab>Hmmm... While I understand your desire to train the finest race chocobo possible, I fear you overestimate your steed's capabilities...
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_ERROR_003_02<tab>Your race chocobo must unlearn an ability before you can teach it a new one.

TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_ERROR_004_01<tab>A bold strategy, <var 08 E905 ((madam)) ((sir)) /var>, but a futile one, I fear. Chocobos lack the capacity to differentiate between such similar abilities.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_ERROR_004_02<tab>Your race chocobo cannot learn two abilities of the same type.
TEXT_CMNGSCCHOCOBORACEGETABILITY_00228_ERROR_004_03<tab>If you wish to teach your chocobo a more powerful version of a learned ability, you must first have it unlearn the weaker version.
